name: Aristide Fattori
body:
# About

I'm currently working as a security consultant at [Emaze](http://blog.emaze.net/).

I got a Ph.D. in Computer Science in 2014 from the Università degli
Studi di Milano, in the [LaSER](http://security.di.unimi.it/) Lab (Systems and network
security). My Ph.D. thesis is titled "Hardware-assisted Virtualization
and its Applications to Systems Security", and is
available [here](http://air.unimi.it/bitstream/2434/233326/2/phd_unimi_r09034.pdf)(official)
and [here](stuff/phd.pdf) (w/ revisions).
